author: jenniferwZ9354AP
title: Stay at the Archer -
text: I was in town on Business during the snow storm. The hotel is conveniently located 2 blocks from my office which made it easy to get to work in the snow. The hotel staff and restaurant staff were very accomodating and lovely. Rooms were "Intimate" meaning on the smaller side but it was cozy. I would definitely stay here again.
